text:
Last week Wendy Williams and her husband Kevin Hunter were vacationing in Barbados and the paparazzi caught the couple at the beach.

Wendy said that she was having the "time of her life" with Kevin on a "lovers holiday" and had no idea the paparazzi was shooting them.

Miss Wendy got read for filth about her bikini body. The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Eden Sasson came for Wendy over instagram and T.I. even posted about her body in a passive aggressive rant. In response to Wendy's leaked pics, the rapper said:

"Let’s see if the power of mercy moves her heart to not be so malicious & vindictive in the future when she’s speaking on the lives of other strangers when they’re going through their own PERSONAL tough times.”

Wendy clapped back to all the online haters by saying "I got it goin' on, honey! My belly is tight." The talk show host also defended her bikini body by saying "I'm 53 and yes I can still dip and do it in a bikini." YAS Wendy!

Williams added that “I have a flat behind. I talk about it all the time. I’m shaped like a capital P… I can joke about myself before you ever joke with me.”

Miss Wendy Williams is a grown ass woman and isn't gonna let the haters bring her down! The Queen of Shade is unbothered by these peasants coming for her thrown!

The Wendy Williams Show returns for it's ninth season on Monday with more fun and shadiness! Check your local listings!
title: Queen Wendy Williams Is Defending Her Bikini Body
